name: Golden Oldies Jukebox CD-I : An Interactive Music Video Experience
summary: Jump n jam to the bop tunes of the 50's & 60's. The best of the golden oldies and the artists who sang them come alive on your TV screen. Original hits by the original artists with several delux features;Over 50 minutes of re-mastered digital audio*Over one & one half hours of video*Song lyrics cued in sync with music*Song shuffle for random play* Create your own customized playlist for parties or personal listening!
